title: Abraham’s Death and the Birth of Esau and Jacob
summary: Genesis 25 covers Abraham’s death and burial. It lists his descendants through Keturah. The birth of Esau and Jacob to Isaac and Rebekah is recorded, and Esau sells his birthright for a meal.

faq.question: What happened to Abraham?
faq.answer: He died at a good old age and was buried beside Sarah.

faq.question: Why did Esau sell his birthright?
faq.answer: He was hungry and undervalued the importance of his birthright, trading it for food.
